notices: Made 'meteor run' more sensitive to file changes during bundler
runs. Let glasser know if you see any strange behavior related
This notice is printed when you upgrade an app to 0.6.0-rc3.
It's not very useful to anybody who isn't testing that
the message is printed. But somebody is!
Variables declared with `var` at the outermost level of a JavaScript
source file are now private to that file. Remove the `var` to share
